title: Marianne
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Bakery, German
description: Small, atmospheric vegetarian cafe with labeled vegan and gluten free options. Comprehensive breakfast menu includes bread/rolls, sweet and savory spreads, and soy yogurt. General menu with hot drinks, organic soft drinks, sandwiches, waffles. Daily specials such as soup are announced on the blackboard. Several cakes are on display, some marked vegan or gluten-free. Limited seating.
